title: Why ice storms are so bad for power grids
full_text: Why ice storms are so bad for power grids. What makes ice storms particularly devastating to electrical infrastructure compared to other severe weather events? An expert explains.. As a massive winter storm continues to pummel the eastern United States with dangerous ice and freezing rain, more than a million customers across multiple states remain without power. Tennessee, Mi… [+613 chars]
